alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Polk County Higher Elevations; Northern Scott County; Northwest Yell County; Polk County Lower Elevations; Southeast Polk County Higher Elevations; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 23 at 4:11AM CST until January 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...A winter storm system will be approaching from the southwest and will bring 4 to 8 inches of snow to portions of the area. Locally higher amounts are possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Arkansas and the higher terrain of the Ouachita Mountains. * WHEN...Tuesday afternoon through early Wednesday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on dangerous travel conditions and possible power outages.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is a potential for significant snow, sleet, or ice accumulations that may affect travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
